Deliver to: St. John's, NL...The report can be downloaded from the link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/02/0fc36a59602d9cd16d7462169e05a958/30003836_-_npp_fr.pdf
full_summary:
======================

### Canadian Government Tender Announcement

**Title**
===========

E60HN-16ELEC Stream 1 9.5 UPS

### Tender Details

**Reference Number**
------------------

PW-22-01015765

**Publication Date**
-----------------

02 December 2022

**Tender Closing Date**
---------------------

16 December 2022, 14:00:00

### Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Coast Guard has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of uninterruptible power supply (UPS) systems and auxiliary components.

**Background**

This notice is published as part of the Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HN-16ELEC with Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC). Only pre-qualified suppliers have been invited to bid on this RFP.

**Procurement Details**

* Location: St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador
* Delivery Date: March 31, 2023
* Procurement Method: Selective Tendering

**Buying Entity**

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is the buying entity for this procurement.

**Contracting Officer Information**

* Name: Stephanie Patry
* Contact Email: [DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)

### Attachments

The RFP document can be downloaded from [Canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/02/ab68601a65599a4921119b126371cb3c/30003836_-_npp_en.pdf) and [Achatsetventes](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/02/0fc36a59602d9cd16d7462169e05a958/30003836_-_npp_fr.pdf).

### Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Eligibility

Only pre-qualified suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with PSPC are eligible to submit a bid.

I hope this helps! Please let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance with any other contracts. You can reach me directly anytime or through our email:_epiomore@gmail.com. (Note: while writing, consider leaving some gap before next line for readability) 


Best regards
